about_the_game:
Roberto el Lagarto invites you to experience the exciting life of a lizard thief on an adventurous mission: to plunder a museum full of treasures while using your unique skills to avoid security. In this single-player action and stealth game, each theft is a combination of strategy and skill.

🎮 Key Features

✨ Special Abilities
  • 🏃 Sprint: Run at full speed to escape from tricky situations.
  • 👻 Invisibility: Disappear from the sight of security cameras, guards, and visitors for a limited time.
  • 🍬 Bubble Gum: Throw a bubble gum on the ground that slows down any enemy who steps on it, creating timely escape routes.
  • ⚡ EMP: Stun all guards, visitors, and cameras in the museum, giving you a valuable advantage. This ability has limited uses, adding an element of strategy to its usage.

🎯 Game Objective
Steal all the exhibited artworks from the museum, each clearly marked. As you accumulate more items, you must tread carefully and hide to avoid being caught. Use your skills to go across the museum and deposit the loot in the delivery areas.

🔍 Environment Interaction
  • 📦 Throwing Objects: Dispose of your loot or stun enemies by throwing stolen objects.
  • 🗿 Delivery Statues: Find odd statues of Roberto in each museum area to securely deposit your loot. These statues will subtly move to reveal the delivery area.

🚨 Diversity of Enemies and Challenges
  • 👮 Guards and Visitors: Guards patrol every area of the museum and they are looking for any anomalies, while visitors can alert guards if they spot you. Stay aware and use your skills to evade them.
  • 📹 Security Cameras: Avoid cameras that are constantly on alert in the museum. If they detect you, they will alert the guards, adding an extra level of security to that area.

🏛️ Game Environment
A unique museum with different areas like: war zone, jewelry zone, abstract zone, painting zone, shop, reception, rest areas, and bathrooms. Dynamic challenges with unpredictable movements of visitors and the presence of guards and cameras, creating an exciting, dynamic, and different gaming experience in each playthrough.

🎨 Graphic Style and Animations
  • Colorful cartoon graphics which make it a charming environment around the museum.
  • Exaggerated and entertaining animations that add a touch of humor and charm to the game.
  • Characters with caricatured proportions that provide a unique style.

👤 Game Modes
Single Player: Experience how is the life of Roberto the Lizard, a cunning chameleon on a mission to loot the museum.

📖 Story and Narrative
Enjoy an easy going action and funny game.
Throughout the game, you'll receive calls from eccentric contractors offering you optional missions. Completing these missions will grant you valuable rewards, improving your skills and giving you additional advantages.

🏆 Challenges and Achievements
  • More than 10 optional missions that add depth, diversity, and more challenges to the adventure.
  • 26 Steam achievements to unlock, showcasing your prowess and completed accomplishments in the game.
